duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide acute product training, troubleshooting, and resolution to product complaints for AB recipients.
Proactively support CI recipients and complete transition from the CICS/Outreach once surgery is completed.

Ensure recipients' success, specifically focused on product orientation, connectivity w/ Bluetooth enabled accessories, ongoing product and accessory use and maintenance, rehab resources, and use of the consumer portal.
Document recipient interactions and report back to audiologist.
Increase recipient satisfaction by communicating through their preferred mode of communication and providing help with access to and orientation of the Consumer Portal.
Train and coach entry-level position holders and be responsible for tier bowler meetings to report on KPI metrics.
Handle first-line escalation of recipient complaints or questions from entry-level team members and attain and utilize competitor comparison knowledge.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Sales, Business, or a related field (Masters or Doctoral Degree preferred)
